Description: Create a basic login page with username and password fields.
AcceptanceCriteria: User can enter credentials. Validation for empty fields. Successful login redirects to dashboard.

Description: Allow users to view and edit their profile information.
AcceptanceCriteria: User can update name and email. Changes are saved to DB.

Description: Integrate Stripe for credit card payments.
AcceptanceCriteria: User can enter card details. Payment is processed securely. Receipt is emailed.

Description: Implement AR view for products using WebXR.
AcceptanceCriteria: User can view product in 3D space. Supports scaling and rotation.

Description: Migrate old user data to new schema.
AcceptanceCriteria: All records transferred. Data integrity verified. No downtime.
User can search by keyword. Results displayed in dropdown.

Description: Create dashboard for admins to view stats.
AcceptanceCriteria: Charts for user growth and revenue. Export to CSV.
Websockets implementation. Toast notifications on UI.

Description: Virtual reality tour of real estate properties.
Fix issue where login button is disabled on mobile.
AcceptanceCriteria: Button is clickable on all screen sizes.
